price: 13. Hoos u dhiga hadalkiinna ama kor u qaada. (Alle) wuu Og yahay waxa ku jira laabaha (dadka).
arabic: وَأَسِرُّواْ قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱجۡهَرُواْ بِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-asirrū qawlakum awi ij'harū bihi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
